Affirmation #5: Sucking at something is the first step towards being good at something

Affirmation #7: Everything has cracks - that is how the light gets in

Affirmation #8: Mistakes do not make you less capable

Affirmation #9: We are all works in progress

Affirmation #12: I know more than I think

Affirmation #13: If everything was easy I would be bored

Affirmation #14: I admire myself for taking this on

Affirmation #17: I know I will sort it out

Affirmation #19: I am doing a great job

Affirmation #22: I give myself permission to love myself

Affirmation #23: I give myself permission to love others

Affirmation #24: My mind is full of brilliant ideas

Affirmation #25: I make a difference in the world by simply existing in it

Affirmation #26: I am learning valuable lessons every day

Affirmation #27: I am worthy and deserving of respect

Affirmation #28: I know more than I knew yesterday

Affirmation #30: My life is already a miracle of chance waiting for me to shape its destiny

Affirmation #31: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I’m possible!'

Affirmation #32: Failure is just another way to learn how to do something right

Affirmation #33: I give myself permission to do what is right for me

Affirmation #35: It is not a sprint, it is a marathon. One step at a time

Affirmation #36: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal

Affirmation #37: People with goals succeed because they know where they are going

Affirmation #38: All I need is the plan, the roadmap, and the courage to press on to my destination

Affirmation #39: The opposite of courage in our society is not cowardice... it is conformity

Affirmation #40: Whenever we’re afraid, it’s because we don’t know enough. If we understood enough, we would never be afraid

Affirmation #41: The past does not equal the future

Affirmation #42: The path to success is to take massive, determined action

Affirmation #43: It’s what you practice in private that you will be rewarded for in public

Affirmation #45: Don't worry if you find flaws in your past creations, it's because you've evolved

Affirmation #46: Starting is the most difficult step - but you can do it
